item.title: Notes on Learning Calculus of Variations
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: A study note on the calculus of variations based on “Fundamentals of Dynamic Optimization” (Alpha C. Chiang), covering applications such as the catenary problem, the brachistochrone problem, and monopoly pricing.
